content: pick up and knit 105 stitches along a slipped-stitch edge 21 stitches on each needle to make the knitting look neat use a thinner needles for this next knit on usual knitting needles repeat from round 1 to round 11 @dunaksa 6/9 fig 5 put the stuffing into the star fig 6 cut the yarn and gather 5 remaining stitches together pull tight fix the yarn and hide it inside the star @dunaksa 7/9 fig 7 now the star is finished @dunaksa 8/9 thank you follow my instagram @dunaksa and you won t miss out my new patterns with best wishes ksenia @dunaksa 9/9
